message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $1,200,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item that holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm definitely interested in the product, but $1,200,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider a price closer to $850,000?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I am unable to accept $850,000 for the product, I am willing to consider a price closer to $950,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. I'm willing to increase my offer to $900,000.  I believe that's a fair price that reflects the value of the product and our mutual desire to make a deal.
